ygData.subject: Hail
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello my name is Meltonia wait Ludicious no..... Mesopoles.... errr Just pick one... I am them all, and I am a addict. I have stayed up late at night playing
ygData.messageBody:
Hello my name is Meltonia wait Ludicious no.....
Mesopoles.... errr Just pick one... I am them all, and I am a
addict. I have stayed up late at night playing for hours
put off sex... only to realize it's 4:00a.m. and I
gotta be at work by 5:00a.m.... Went to work finished
early and logged on at work... tee hee... Anyhow anyone
play on drinal..(I find so few) look me up as one of
the following... am bored not talking and killing
sitting medding... *blink* *snore* <br><br>Meltonia Druid
of the 17th season<br>Ludicious Gnome Warrior of the
8th season (ya ya ya i know a gnome warrior? why?
Cause they rule.)<br>Mesopoles gnome Wizard of the 9th
season..<br>I to do not get high enough yet but hey i've only
been playin a month and a half...sheesh... I'm broke.
<br><br>Non-twink. (explains why I'm broke.)
